transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir, awaz nahi aa rahi aapko aapko?
Customer: Ha ji bolo.
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Aa rahi hai ji.
Executive: Ji. To mai aapke company ke regarding discussion karna chahta tha ye Prajapati steel udyog chal rahi hai apne IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Ha chal rahi hai ji.
Executive: Ji, isko kaun handle karta hai sir aapke side se? Koi aapka staff hai ya aap? Kya baat hai bolo ji.
Executive: To kal kya koi dikkat aa rahi hai sir aapko bataiye?
Customer: Inquiry nahi aa rahi aur dikkat kya hai?
Executive: Inquiry nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Baat to sir daily ho rahi hai aapke sath mein ye tiles display stand mein aapka jo product ek hai ye.
Customer: Ha ji?
Executive: Sir inquiry call by lead bhi consume kiya ja raha hai aapke. Jo mai bata, mai jo mai bata raha hu wo nahi sunai de raha kya aapko?
Executive: Wo bilkul sunai de raha hai sir hame.
Customer: Ha to fir aap keh rahe ho na inquiry aa rahi hai. Mai keh raha nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Abhi is time pe mai baat karna chah raha hu jaise kal aapne do char buyer se baat ki hogi sir mai wahi jaanna chah raha hu kya baat hui hogi aapki inse. Hum usko sahi karte hai.
Customer: Ha to hum keh rahe inquiry nahi aa rahi proper kam business nahi mil raha.
Executive: Kal sir aapne New Delhi ke Arshad naam ke buyer se baat ki hogi. Hai na? Theek hai ji. Chalo theek hai ji, kariye baat. Sabse baat karte hai hum.
Customer: Unse koi response to nahi milta baat tasalli se hoti hai. Wahi puch rahe hai hum kya baat hoti hai.
Executive: To mai bata raha hu yaar aapne meri to sunai nahi dete aapne keh rahe usse baat kariye usse baat kariye. Fir unka koi response hi nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Jab koi party ka response hi nahi milega to wo kya inquiry hai?
Executive: Wo flow change karte hai sir ek baar. Unse baat kariye usse baat kariye. Meeting wagera align kariye sir aap. Aapne jisse baat kar rahe ho wo jo keh raha hai wo jhoot thodi hai kya?
Customer: Hmm hmm. Kya keh rahe hai?
Executive: To jisse aap baat kar rahe ho wo baat kar raha hai wo jhoot bol raha hai kya wo inquiry aapne wo kariye wo kariye wo dikh rahi hai aapko.
Executive: Nahi jo aapne consume ki mai uska feedback puch raha hu aap se.
Customer: Ha to mai bata raha hu na inquiry nahi mil rahi proper jo mil rahi hai sab aise bakwas hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir to ek kam karte hai aap ek kam kariega aap system wagera pe aap kab tak available hai aap mujhe bataiye us time mai aap se meeting karke ek baar discuss kar leta hu chizo ko. Dhire dhire kya dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi to mai safar mein hu.
Executive: Safar mein hai aap. Theek hai. Koi staff wagera rakha hai aapne apna?
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Koi staff bhi aapka hai handle karta hai yaha pe?
Customer: Ha to wo bhi ladka bhi staff nahi hai kal baat karna 9 baje.
Executive: Chalo sir theek hai. Ha ji.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states that he is not receiving inquiries.

- Customer says he is not getting proper business.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to understand the issue.

- Executive suggested changing the flow.

- Executive offered to schedule a meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with staff next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, meeting, staff
